title: Hepatitis Cases in Children Have Parents Asking, ‘Should We Worry?’
sub_head: More than 100 cases of severe hepatitis in children have been reported globally. What to know about symptoms, and how to spot signs that something is amiss
body:
A number of mysterious hepatitis cases in children is puzzling doctors and alarming some parents.
At least 169 cases of severe hepatitis in children, which is usually rare, have been reported globally as of April 26, according to the World Health Organization. More than a dozen cases have been reported in the U.S., according to state public health departments. The cause is still unknown.
